Detailed Description

Implements the VDM distance function for nominal attributes.

This is an implementation of the DistanceFunction abstract class for nominal attributes. It implements the VDM distance. This metric uses the frequency of each value per class in the training data set to determine the proximity of two values. For further details see (Randall & Martinez, 1997).
